sub_title: Creator | Speaker | Semiconductor Professional | UN Volunteer
summary:
Have you ever thought, what's at the core of ALL the electronic devices, ALL over the world, and also in outer space!!?
The logic and memory chips, and there is a high chance that it was made on our ASML machines. 

I am one of the proud product development professional helping to create these machines.
Passionately curious about complex technology products, processes and business along with its implications in the real world, I have lived and worked across multiple countries in Asia and Europe.

Developing some of the extremely complex, semiconductor chip making machineries fueling the future of digital technologies across all the sectors. Following the inspiring Moore's law, printing nanometers on chips to get the best products out, I focus on the System Design for Diagnostics, predictive maintenance and service models.

Previous experience in automotive technology, predictive maintenance, Industrial IOT and service business strategy.

awards.title: Third Position in Future of Retail Strategy.
awards.description: Task was to make a retail strategy on how the future of retail will be in next decade or so. Taking FMC goods as base, we devised the strategy of retailing of B2C sales model with respect to the growing technology, advent of IoT, AR/VR, Industry 4.0 and Artificial Intelligence.

projects.title: Design and Fabrication of Human Powered Pelltizer
projects.description: Working on design and fabrication of human powered pelletizer, where the objective is to amplify the human output(which is maximum of 0.1 hP) to 3-12 hp in an intermittent process/operation involving Pelletizing.

projects.title: Design and Fabrication of Manually-Driven Pelletizing Machine
projects.description:
-- Working to design and develop a small-scale manually driven pellet-making machine, which would help in generating employment in rural areas, with pellets acting as an alternative source of energy.
-- Currently working on design and analysis of the machine parts and a human-powered flywheel motor mechanism, and planning to study the effects of variations in parameters on the machine and its output.
-- Primary objective is to amplify the human output (which is maximum of 0.1 HP) to 3-12 HP in an intermittent process/operation involving pelletizing.

company.name: Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations (HPAIR)

volunteer_experiences.description: The Rumie Initiative is a non-profit with the vision of a world where everyone has equal access to learning. Our mission is to mobilize the power of collaboration to improve access to quality digital learning resources. Rumie’s approach begins with the LearnCloud - an online repository of high quality, digital, educational content which is crowdsourced by educators and other passionate volunteers in different languages and for different contexts. Rumie then works with local on-the-ground program partners around the world who choose the learning material that is most appropriate for their unique context and load that content onto the specialized Rumie Tablet or any personal Android device via the Rumie App for offline use.

-A Bridge between the German and the Indian education/research system

The vast majority of our future employees are currently still at university. So obviously, this is an environment that we concentrate much of our resources, communicating not only that ASML is a great place, but also communicating why it is a great place to work. My role is to promote the employer brand and help students understand ASML as well as the transition from university to corporate.

volunteer_experiences.role: Delegate- High Level Panel, Model United Nations 2016
volunteer_experiences.description:
High Level Panel under Model United Nations 2016. Panel of experts from various fields trying to answer the question, should we really replace soldiers with highly automatic machines one day?
Aim of committee was to find a clear path for Lethal Autonomous Weapon Systems (LAWS) and give the rest of the world a satisfied answer.
3 Days of conference with multiple motions of discussions yielded a Memorandum stating the analysis, further actions and recommendations to United Nations Secretary General.
